attributes.description:
All vehicles are available for CASH,FINANCE AND TRADE IN. Roadworthy are subject to payment for Change of ownership. Our finance is done through all major banks with an additional administrative charge of  R10.000- R15.000 depending on the car. Trade-ins are also accepted even for vehicles ththat are not fully papaid off, delivery is nationwide and fees are charged based on location. Buying a used car from us means buying Peace of mind, Quality, Choice and Value.

THANK YOU. SIYABONGA. KEALEBOHA. DANKIE.
